ygData.subject: Re: You regain concentration and continue casting...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What level are you? I haven t regained until I hit 11 (or was it 8?). Anyway, yes, it does improve with leveling. I have never regained as much as I did on
ygData.messageBody:
Phil Showalter wrote:

>
> Very interesting...... I'm a lvl 12 Gnome Wizard with dex of 89 and I have
> *never* been able to continue a spell against anything. Perhaps it's my
> relatively low level?
>
> Xorgan

What level are you? I haven't regained until I hit 11 (or was it 8?). Anyway,
yes, it does improve with leveling. I have never regained as much as I did on
level 15, and I expect to do it more in 16.

--
Sergey
--
KPS PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
